website_summaries.verdict: A prefect little kit for cleaning your handheld firearms.
pros: Quality tools for a very affordable price
All the necessary tools to keep your handguns maintained
A versatile set that's durable and easy to store
cons: Casing doesn't keep the tools securely in place while stored inside
This could result in broken or lost pieces

customer_reviews.title: cheap, low quality.
customer_reviews.text: the handle does not allow the rod/cable to spin, the threaded brass piece is simply pressed into the molded plastic. the cable is cheap, brass parts are simply crimped on. the various tips dont screw completely into the rod. i could go on. pass on this, spend the money on a better quality kit. wish i would have, since i will have to buy a quality kit after spending on this one. **upadte** upon seeing this review, the seller did, unprompted, offer to replace or refund, to which i accepted a refund. customer service is at least good.
customer_reviews.author: Fergy

customer_reviews.title: Great value and well equipped set
customer_reviews.text: Found this set to have everything I need to clean my 9mm. All the various cleaning tips one needs to thoroughly clean a pistol. Parts screw/fit together nicely, and all it needs is your solvent of choice to put it to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan DeLuca

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: This kit is so amazing, it's small and convenient. it comes with the right tools and i was able to efficiently clean my GLCK19X with no problem. i love that it came with two packs of wipes and the screw brush. I added it to my weapons/range bag and it fits and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: SHAMAR JACKSON

customer_reviews.title: Good for a new gun owner
customer_reviews.text: If you need a great starter kit or of you only have one or 2 guns, this is perfect. Once you do more shooting and cleaning you will probably figure out that you need more stuff. Very compact and easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: eatongee

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: I am doing away with universal kits and getting all caliber specific kits. This one I really liked. It has a nice, solid case and the cleaning rods and ends are solid. good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great small cleaning kit
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need is in here, except cleaning solvents. I use this one more often than my full size kit. Very nice zippered case.
customer_reviews.author: kez panel project

customer_reviews.title: Nice small cleaning kit portable for range bag!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice kit I bought it for a friend as a gift! Perfect, portable kit to carry in Range bag! Easy to use and put up! I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Terance D. O'Neill

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Cleans the gun well Compact Easy to use Quality stuff
customer_reviews.author: CrimsonAngel

customer_reviews.title: Handgun cleaning kit
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly as promised and contains everything needed for small handgun cleaning!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: A gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my father and he was very pleased! He said it had a lot of pieces he didn’t usually see them gun cleaning kit, and he really liked the hard shelled case which hebcan take with him.
customer_reviews.author: boyschool

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: The quality and varieties of pieces were better than expected. It has everything needed for a starter bore cleaning kit. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John Neumann

customer_reviews.title: quick shipping
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, used it right away. And it has everything you need. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: k.messi

customer_reviews.title: super price for kit
customer_reviews.text: have not used yet bub good to have if needed
customer_reviews.author: BobyJo

customer_reviews.title: Convenient & compact
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of a cleaning kit 5hat is compact, I quite often do a field cleaning after a few hundred rounds.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Small and nice
customer_reviews.text: vary nice compact case, top quality cleaning kit. Great gift idea
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, inexpensive pistol cleaning case. Small enough to carry in the range bag and it’s case is well constructed. There is enough room in the case to add other caliber tips and more cleaning patches.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: I love the case, everything has a place and it's not just roaming around my gun bag. The cable pull attaching to the T handle is a great idea. It all feels like a good product.
customer_reviews.author: twopicklekid

customer_reviews.title: Sad
customer_reviews.text: Item I received was not as described. What I received was a used, dirty, ugly product which was clearly not what was listed or pictured. Very unhappy. I sent back for a return/refund we will see what happens
customer_reviews.author: Ronald1029

customer_reviews.title: Great for Pistols
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for cleaning my Glock 19, I don't use the all of the extensions, but the tools I use are perfect for cleaning all parts of the pistol. I recommend getting more more cotton splotches for pulling through the barrel.
customer_reviews.author: evan king

customer_reviews.title: Amazing exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing and exactly as described. It is also exactly what I was looking for to go with my other cleaning kit. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeana Persinger

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit for a 9mm shooter to carry
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be well thought out other than the steel pick, I tossed that and put a plastic one in along with a handful of "Q-Tips'. You do need to add your CLP, oil and grease as it doesn't come with any. But for the price it's a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Carlton M Nash

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Amazing compact kit!! Everything seems to be sturdy and durable. Great size and the price was perfect. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Freddie G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, perfect for the cost! Love how compact it is, fits perfectly in my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Rylan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice kit
customer_reviews.text: This kit is the right size to carry in my handgun suitcase. All items within this kit are very good.
customer_reviews.author: Paulo Corso

customer_reviews.title: Great for weapons cleaning
customer_reviews.text: The kit works well for my M9. The brushes clean thoroughly and the variety helps.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry O.

customer_reviews.title: Gun cleaning kit
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Haven't used it yet, but has the tools I need.
customer_reviews.author: James Porges

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I love this nice zipper case, feels like its built to last. It has everything I need to clean my pistols. All the pieces are placed in a foam insert so that they aren't just rolling around everywhere and easy to retrieve. Looks more expensive than it was.
customer_reviews.author: Shu Yong Lin

customer_reviews.title: Great little case of hand gun cleaning tools.
customer_reviews.text: Comes with everything you need to clean your hand gun
customer_reviews.author: Guy

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice hand gun kit. Now I have what I wanted -- a kit I can take with me just about anywhere. The compactness of the kit to keeps everything organized is its advantage. Pretty nice kit for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dawei Jian

customer_reviews.title: Very compact, can take it anywhere.
customer_reviews.text: Was a birthday present for my son. Uses it for cleaning his pistols.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin May

customer_reviews.title: 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟Best gun cleaning kit I have used.🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟
customer_reviews.text: Folks I looked at many gun cleaning kits on Amazon and this is the best. First the negitives THERE ARE NONE. Now the positives. First the hard shell case. Second the nylon brushes Third most components are brass. Fourth the mops (2). Fifth easy to use Sixth Great value. Very HIGHLY RECOMEND.
customer_reviews.author: AnthonyTop Contributor: Harmonicas

customer_reviews.title: Fresh Lube
customer_reviews.text: This a nice kit for cleaning your small firearm, I use it for my 9mm and works well except I did not know how to clean it so it would have been nice if it gave what each tool is used for.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: No Cleaning Patches
customer_reviews.text: My cleaning kit order was fulfilled by Amazon is incomplete. The listing clearly states that it contains "50 Pcs Gun Cleaning Patches", and mine had exactly zero. I shopped all-in-1 kits extensively, and bought this one thinking I would be set. $20 was worth it if the kit arrived as described, but as it is I now have to spend more money on a separate purchase of patches, with another vendor, before I even begin cleaning my firearm. 2 stars max, unless remedied by Amazon or vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Painter

customer_reviews.title: Good compact size
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good cleaning kit that has most of what you need to clean your 9mm other than the lubricating/cleaning oil and rags. It works for me. I also like the small size of the case and the inside storage pocket.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Gun Cleaning Kit
customer_reviews.text: What is there to not like it? It has a nice case that is durable and water resistant as well as compact. Get it.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Leake

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect fit for my current needs! It is super easy to use and when I opened it, I was shocked at all the stuff that came with it!
customer_reviews.author: Jon

product_meta.title: Raiseek Handgun Cleaning kit .357 Caliber 9mm Pistol Cleaning Kit Bore Brush and Jag in Zippered Organizer Compact Case
feature_bullets: Zippered Compact Padded Case: Keeps everything neatly organized; Holds all the necessary cleaning tools; Case sized: 3.5" x 6.3 "; 15 Pieces handgun gun maintenance system in a high performance zippered organized pouch bag

Gun Cleaning Supplies Includes: 2 Pcs .357Cal phosphor bronze bore brushes, 2 Pcs .357Cal nylon brushes, 2 Pcs .357 cotton mops, 1 Pcs .30 bronze slotted tips, 1 Pcs .357Cal brass jag, 50 Pcs gun cleaning patches, 1 Pcs nylon brush, 1 Pcs metal gun cleaning pick, 1 Pcs T-handle, 2 Pcs cleaning rod and 1 Pcs nylon coated flex cable
Quality 10.5" Handgun Cleaning Rod: 2 Piece brass cleaning rods thread together to form a 10.5" rod
Cleaning Cable: The nylon coated flex cable makes feeding the brushes into a barrel very easy
Life Time & Money Back Guarantee: The cleaning rod, jag and slotted tips are all made of durable sturdy bronze brass which are guaranteed a life time.
